      Parameters:

      t - the spike
      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true/false

    • boxIntersectingLine

      private boolean boxIntersectingLine(Pair p1, Pair p2, int depth, BoxBounds bounds, Pair pos)
      Cohen Sutherland clipping algorithm. Should run 2 times at most.
      Parameters:
      p1 - first end point of the line
      p2 - second end point of the line
      depth - recursive functions need a maximum amount of loops. (catch)
      bounds - the actual bounds of the player
      pos - the position of the boxBounds
      Returns:
      true/false whether we are intersecting or not

    • narrowPhase

      private boolean narrowPhase(BoxBounds b)
      Second phase of collision resolution. Checks if the player has collided with the actual bounds of the triangle.
      Parameters:
      b - player bounds
      Returns:
      true/false
